projects.title: Bay Area Outdoor Carpentry Contractor
projects.description: Worked as a landscape designer for System Pavers, a multinational hardscape, decking, and turf installation company in California. Designed large-scale residential and commercial projects, sold multiple jobs exceeding $100,000. Used 3D design software to generate detailed models and communicate design concepts with clients, facilitating complex project visualization and approval.
projects.technologies: 3D Design Software, Hardscape Design, Client Relations, Large-Scale Project Management

projects.title: Landscape Designer
projects.description: Worked as a landscape designer for System Pavers, a multinational hardscape, decking, and turf installation company in California. Designed large-scale residential and commercial projects, sold multiple jobs exceeding $100,000. Used 3D design software to generate detailed models and communicate design concepts with clients, facilitating complex project visualization and approval.
projects.technologies: 3D Design Software, Hardscape Design, Client Relations, Large-Scale Project Management

projects.title: Blaptica Dubia Cockroach Farm
projects.description: Built and operated an incubated breeding system housing approximately 40,000 Blaptica dubia cockroaches, wholesaling to local pet shops as a feed source for reptiles and amphibians.
projects.technologies: Animal Husbandry, Environmental Control Systems, Small Business Operations

projects.title: Rodent Anesthesia Masks
projects.description: Designed and manufactured custom anesthesia masks for rodent model research - both stereotaxic and non-stereotaxic deisgns.
projects.technologies: SolidWorks CAD, SLA & FDM 3D Printing, B2B Sales & Marketing

projects.title: Vertical Pole Evolution - Rodent Model Stroke Recovery Tracking Behavioral Test
projects.description: Designed and built multiple iterations of behavioral testing equipment for neurological deficit assessment in rats post-ischemic stroke. Custom equipment enabled more accurate measurement of treatment effectiveness in the Department of Neurosurgery research lab.

projects.title: Operational Strandbeest Sculpture
projects.description: Medium-sized operational kinetic sculpture inspired by Theo Jansen's designs. Constructed from over 500 pieces of cold drawn and flat steel, assembled with over 2,000 welds. Fully rideable and functional.
